name: Exerion
description: This is a shoot-em-up game with parallax effects in the background. It does have a simulation of inertia in the control of the ship.There are dozens of enemies and two types of shooting: slow and fast. Two weapon systems: one slow double-shot cannon and one fast single-shot cannon.With each enemy hit by the slow cannon you get one shot added to the fast cannon ammunition supply.A challenge stage follows each stage in which you can build up your fast-shot bullet supply.
alsoFor: Arcade, NES, PlayStation 4, SG-1000, Wii, Wii U, Windows | Combined View
